message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm offering it to you for $130. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and I'm willing to pay up to $120 for it. Let me know if this works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $125. This would still give you a great deal and allow me to get closer to my desired price. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable.
